math - package math
Provides basic mathematical components for computer graphics: 2-, 3, 4- dimensional vectors, 3- and 4-dimensional matrices and Quaternions
math.function - package math.function
Provides functions interface for different kind of functions
math.function.util - package math.function.util
Provides different functions, like interpolation functions (Bezier, Catmull-Rom, PiecewiseLinear) and some example functions that could be used as a motion path (Gauss curve, Helix curve, SawTooth curve,...).
MathUtil - Class in math
Mathematical operations and constants

max(Vec2) - Method in class math.Vec2
Returns a vector containing the component-wise maxima

v1 = [0, 5]
v2 = [3, 0]

v1.max( v2 ) = [3, 5]
max(Vec2, Vec2) - Static method in class math.Vec2
Returns a new vector containing the component-wise maxima
v1 = [0, 5]
v2 = [3, 0]

max( v1, v2 ) = [3, 5]
max(Vec3) - Method in class math.Vec3
Returns a vector containing the component-wise maxima

this = [0, 5, 1]
v2 = [3, 0, 2]

this.max( v2 ) = [3, 5, 2]
max(Vec3, Vec3) - Static method in class math.Vec3
Returns a new vector containing the component-wise maxima of two vectors
v1 = [0, 5, 1]
v2 = [3, 0, 2]

max( v1, v2 ) = [3, 5, 2]

v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

v1.max( v2 ) = [3, 5, 2, 1]
